channel.title: Remember Tomorrow: Waveborn|e
channel.description:
![oskars-sylwan-ES2pgFojCBU-unsplash|690x460,75%](upload://3tP8f39VA4xioDMh4Srfke34TN9.jpeg)
Remember Tomorrow by Gregor Hutton is a GMless roleplaying game. It is Cyberpunk, but not as you know it. The characters aren't in a team or on a mission, there is no major question or story at the heart of things. Instead, it is a game about disparate people in a city of the future, brushing past each other, crashing into each other. The game is dark as our only choice is to play on the terms of uncaring factions. Or is it?
This particular series will feature some set elements inspired by the German movie Wir sind die Flut (2016)
We will be playing over four sessions:
[Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lj7Ebw4g-uxdjlfJOPC) [date=2019-08-09 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] → [date=2019-08-09 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]
[Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lj7EvzIRgIG22UMaDrc) [date=2019-08-16 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] → [date=2019-08-16 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]
[Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lj7FKd0ZeYD-lMwr_GI) [date=2019-08-23 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] → [date=2019-08-23 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]
[Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lj7FgZeBlmI9CO3_NcF) [date=2019-08-30 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] → [date=2019-08-30 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]
Being able to attend each session is ideal, but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
The series will not be recorded.
Lines and Veils will be in use, as well as the X-Card. We will abide by the Gauntlet’s Inclusivity Policy (http://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html).
